title: Speak
text: How do I say "thanks for taking such good care of my daughter" in Chinese

title: edX
text: what is are the leading Cybersecurity courses from Australian universities

title: Tasty Recipes
text: find me a gluten free recipe for meatballs that includes some tomatoes + follow up question

title: VoxScript
text: Give me the transcript for this video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K_xTD33K9uk

title: edX2
text: Can you find me a free course with video content for the AWS Cloud Practitioner cert

title: Career Advice - Based on Real Current Data
text:
here is my Resume url

Please read the entire resume and tell me what are the top 5 best paid job titles that I am qualified to do. Please try to provide an average salary for each of the job titles

title: What if my salary beat inflation by 5%
text: If I earned 50,000 Australian Dollars a year in 2007 and every year since I got a pay increase which was 5% more than the Australian rate of inflation for that year. What would my salary be this year? If you cannot get a rate of inflation for a particular year use the average rate of inflation for the decade

title: Collatz Conjecture - Visualization
text: Can you give me a visualisation of the Collatz Conjecture. Use 3 different value inputs

title: Cicada Emergence Problem
text: If 2 species of cicadas one with a 17 year cycle and another with a 13 year cycle both emerged in 2017, what year will they both emerge next. And how many times will they both emerge in the same year during this millenium.

title: Population of Australia
text: what is the population of Australia?

title: Advertising Campaign
text: Can you please study my website https://goprompt.io and provide me with a step by step set of instructions on how I can promote this website and acquire my first 1000 users

title: What's My Next Video
text:
Analyse this youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/@CodingwithGPT
 for video topics, industry niche and engagement. Then provide content suggestions based on AI news released on week of 15 May 2023

title: GPT-4 Reasoning
text:
Write me some prompt ideas from this link I want to show off the reasoning abilities of GPT-4 

https://newatlas.com/technology/gpt-4-reflexion

title: One Prompt to Rule them All (by Matt Wolfe)
text: What are the absolute coolest, most mind-blowing, out of the box, chatGPT prompts that will really show off the power of chatGPT? Give me 10.

title: Story Generation
text: Write a short story about a time-traveling historian who accidentally changes history

title: Role Playing
text: You are a detective in a noir film. I am a mysterious stranger who just walked into your office. Let's start a dialogue

title: World Building
text: Describe a planet where the inhabitants communicate only through music

title: Scientific Explanation
text: Explain the concept of quantum entanglement to a five-year-old

title: Philosophical Discussion
text: What are the ethical implications of artificial intelligence?

title: Creative Writing
text: Compose a poem about the beauty of mathematics

title: Historical Simulation
text: Imagine you are Leonardo da Vinci. Describe your thought process while painting the Mona Lisa.

title: Language Translation
text: Translate the following English phrase to French: 'The spirit of discovery is the heart of humanity

title: Math Problem Solving
text: Solve the following equation for x: 3x^2 - 7x + 2 = 0

title: Futuristic Scenario
text: Describe a day in the life of a person living in a fully sustainable, technologically advanced city in 2123

title: Respond in webpage format
text: For this chat respond only in the format of HTML and CSS. Select theme and fonts at random but make it stylish. Respond with YES if you understand

title: JSON Communication
text: Communicate exclusively using JSON formatted responses, providing information in a structured, machine-readable format.

title: SVG Response Challenge
text: Respond only in SVG format, using vector graphics to represent and convey information in a visual manner.

title: JavaScript Animator
text:
You are a JavaScript animation expert, you are proficient at taking word based descriptions of an animation and representing them in web format using HTML 
+ CSS + JS.

title: Step by step (instant improvement 5-7%)
text: Let’s think step by step”

title: Review and Regenerate
text: Please review your answer and rate it out of 10 for accuracy and effectiveness. Regenerate your answer if either rating is less than 8

title: User provides reasoning steps
text:
Eg. 
1. Write a function that does x
2. Check that that when your function has y input it will return z output 
3. Let me know if the test worked

title: Step by step + double check ( around 10% boost)
text: Answer: lets work this out in a step by step way to make sure that we have the right answer.
